name: Covered Standing Cup
description: Covered Standing Cup; Marcus Heiden (German, active by 1618 until at least 1664); Coburg, Germany; 1631; probably with later 17th century figural elements; Ivory; 63.5 × 11.7 cm (25 × 4 5/8 in.); 91.DH.75; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
